A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Gimme a break.  Visually stunning but it's the same movie every time.  Chase\, bang\, see you next time.  If the baddies had used the weapons they had film would have been over in the first five minutes.  They actually had a chance to do something different with the \"cannon\" scene but just chickened out thus each episode has no drama as stakes are never life and death.  It's filmmaking by numbers.
